review: This device has performed pretty well. The features and loaded apps on it are user friendly. I would suggest this to anyone who does not have a smart TV.I would like to see a device come out with more of an open platform though. I have accounts for many network TV stations who have apps. I would like to be able to download these apps to my Fire TV Stick so that I only have to interface with one device.Once again, I would suggest this device to anyone. It performs flawlessly. It even comes preloaded with your Amazon credentials which really makes this a plug and play device.
